inputs.name: id
inputs.description: This is the unique identifier of a shape

inputs.name: fill
inputs.description: This will control the fill color and style

inputs.name: font
inputs.description: This will control the font color and style

inputs.name: data
inputs.description: Still thinking this one through, maybe just use to store data?

inputs.name: type
inputs.description: This will control the what shape is drawn on the canvas

inputs.name: name
inputs.description: You can use this to give names to your shapes

inputs.name: stroke
inputs.description: This will control the stroke/line color and style

inputs.name: hidden
inputs.description: This will control the visibility of a shape

inputs.name: position
inputs.description: This will provide all coordinates and sizing of a shape

outputs.name: apply
outputs.description: Adds the shape to the canvas, can only be called once per shape

outputs.name: update
outputs.description: Modifies a shapes attributes and styles based on values supplied

outputs.name: remove
outputs.description: Removes the shape from the canvas, can only be called once per shape
